string-array.item: Nothing // Bruno Major

string-array.name: details_song
string-array.item:
[Verse 1] 
 D F F#7 
 Track suits and red wine 
 Bm D7 
 Movies for two 
 G D 
 We'll turn off our phones 
 E7 A7 
 And we'll take off our shoes 
 D F#7 
 We'll play Nintendo 
 Bm D7 
 And I'll always lose 
 G D 
 Cause you'll watch the TV 
 E7 A7 
 Whilst I'm watching you 
 
 
 [Chorus] 
 D F#7 
 Though we might not be dancing 
 Bm D7 
 By the light of the moon 
 G E7 
 Mmmm 
 Em 
 But there's nothing 
 Gm 
 Like doing nothing 
 D 
 With you 
 
 
 [Verse 2] 
 D F#7 
 Dumb conversations 
 Bm D7 
 We lose track of time 
 G D 
 Have I told you lately 
 E7 A7 
 I'm grateful you're mine 
 D F#7 
 We'll watch the Notebook 
 Bm D7 
 For the seventeenth time 
 G D 
 I'll say "It's stupid" 
 E7 A7 
 Then you'll catch me crying 
 
 
 [Chorus] 
 D F#7 
 Though we're not making out 
 Bm D7 
 On a boat in the rain 
 G E7 
 Or in a house I've painted blue 
 Em 
 There's nothing 
 Gm 
 Like doing nothing 
 D 
 With you 
 
 
 [Bridge] 
 Bm 
 So shut all the windows 
 F#7 
 And lock all the doors 
 D 
 We're not looking for no one 
 E7 
 We don't need nothing more 
 Bm 
 You'll bite my lip and 
 F#7 
 I'll want you more 
 D 
 Until we end up 
 E7 
 In a heap in the floor 
 F7 C7 F\#7 B7 Em7 A7 
 Mmmmmm 
 
 
 [Outro] 
 D F#7 
 You could be dancing on table tops 
 Bm D7 
 Wearing high-heels 
 G D 
 Drinking until the world 
 E7 A7 
 Spins like a wheel 
 D F#7 
But tonight my apartment 
 Bm D7 
 Had so much appeal 
 G E7 
 Mmmm 
 Em 
 And there's nothing 
 Gm 
 Like doing nothing 
 Bm7 
 With you 
 E7 
 Mmmm 
 G 
 No, there's nothing 
 A7 
 Like doing nothing 
 D 
 With you

G Em 
 I found a love for me 
 C D 
 Darling just dive right in, and follow my lead 
 G Em 
 Well I found a girl beautiful and sweet 
 C D 
 I never knew you were the someone waiting for me 
 
 
 G 
 Cause we were just kids when we fell in love 
 Em C 
 Not knowing what it was, 
 G D 
 I will not give you up this ti-ime 
 G Em 
 But darling just kiss me slow, your heart is all I own 
 C D 
 And in your eyes you're holding mine 
 
 Em C G D Em 
 Baby, I'm dancing in the dark, with you between my arms 
 C G D Em 
 Barefoot on the grass, listening to our favorite song 
 C G D Em 
 When you said you looked a mess, I whispered underneath my breath 
 C G D G 
 But you heard it, darling you look perfect tonight 
 
 
 G Em 
 Well I found a woman, stronger than anyone I know 
 C D 
 She shares my dreams, I hope that someday I'll share her home 
 G Em 
 I found a love, to carry more than just my secrets 
 C D 
 To carry love, to carry children of our own 
 
 
 G Em 
 We are still kids, but we're so in love, fighting against all odds 
 C G D 
 I know that we'll be alright this ti-ime 
 G Em 
 Darling just hold my hand, be my girl, I'll be your man 
 C D 
 I see my future in your eyes 
 
 
 Em C G D Em 
 Baby, I'm dancing in the dark, with you between my arms 
 C G D Em 
 Barefoot on the grass, listening to our favorite song 
 C G D Em 
 When you said you looked a mess, I whispered underneath my breath 
 C G D G 
 But you heard it, darling you look perfect tonight

[Chorus] 
 Dm G 
 Don't you tell me that it wasn't meant to be 
 C Am 
 Call it quits, call it destiny 
 Dm G 
 Just because it won't come easily 
 C 
 Doesn't mean we shouldn't try 
 
 [Verse 1] 
 Gm Cm 
 We had a good thing going lately 
 F#m 
 Might not have always been a fairytale 
 Bm F#m Gm C 
 But you know and I know that they ain't real 
 F#m 
 I'll take the truth over the story 
 
 [Verse 2] 
 Gm Cm 
 You might've tried my patience lately 
 F#m 
 But I'm not about to let us fail 
 Bm Gm C 
 I'll be the wind picking up your sail 
 F#m Dm 
 But won't you do something for me? 
 
 [Chorus] 
 Dm Gm 
 Don't you tell me that it wasn't meant to be 
 Am C 
 Call it quits, call it destiny 
 Dm G 
 Just because it won't come easily 
 C 
 Doesn't mean we shouldn't try 
 
 [Bridge] 
 Gm C 
 Coming and going, inside out, back to front 
 F#m Bm 
 All tangled and messy, that's how we've been and 
 Gm Dm F#m 
 We'll always be, and that's alright with me 
 
 [Chorus] 
 Dm Gm 
 Don't you tell me that it wasn't meant to be 
 Am C 
 Call it quits, call it destiny 
 Dm G 
 Just because it won't come easily 
 C 
 Doesn't mean we shouldn't try 
 Em Dm Dm G 
 Try, try, just because it won't come easily 
 C 
 Doesn't mean we shouldn't try 
 
 [Chorus] 
 Dm G 
 Just because it won't come easily 
 C 
 Doesn't mean we shouldn't try 
 Em Dm Dm G 
 Try, try, just because it won't come easily 
 C 
 Doesn't mean we shouldn't try

[Intro] 
 G A7 C G 
 
 [Verse 1] 
 
 A7 
 Kamukha mo si Paraluman, 
 C G 
 Nung tayo ay bata pa. 
 G A7 
 At ang galing-galing mo sumayaw, 
 C G 
 Mapa boogie man o cha-cha. 
 G ;A7 
 Ngunit ang paborito, 
 C G 
 Ay pagsayaw mo ng el bimbo. 
 G A7 
 Nakakaindak, nakakaaliw, 
 C G 
 Nakakatindig balahibo. 
 Em G C D 
 Pagkagaling sa skwela ay didiretso na sa inyo, 
 Em G C D

 G A7 
 Magkahawak ang ating kamay, 
 C G

 C G

 G A7

 C G

 G A7

 G A7 
 At dahan-dahang dumudulas, 
 C G 
 Ang kamay ko sa makinis mong braso. 
 Em G C D 
 Sana noon pa man ay sinabi na sa iyo, 
 Em G C D

 [Chorus] 
 G A7 
 Magkahawak ang ating kamay, 
 C G 
 At walang kamalay-malay. 
 G A7

 G

 La la

 La la 
 G

 [Verse 3] 
 A7 
 Lumipas ang maraming taon, 
 C G

 G A7

 C G 
 Ngunit walang asawa. 
 G A7 C

 G 
 Sa may Ermita. 
 G A7 
 At isang gabi nasagasaan, 
 C G 
 Sa isang madilim na eskinita. 
 Em G C D 
 Lahat ng pangarap ko'y bigla lang natunaw, 
 Em G C D 
 Sa panaginip na lang pala kita maisasayaw. 
 
 
 [Chorus] 
 G A7

 A B 
 Don't need nobody else 
 E G#m 
 All my friends are drunk again 
 C#m

 A B 
 Don't need nobody else

 A B

 C#m

 E G#m

[Intro] 
 Am Dm G C 
 A Dm F E7 
 
 
 [Verse 1] 
 Am Dm

 G C

 A Dm

 F E7 
 I'll sing its praise 
 
 
 [Verse 2] 
 Am Dm 
 If we lift our voices high 
 G C 
 Evil forces pass us by 
 A Dm

 [Outro] 
 F E7 Am D 
 Enlighten up, my friends 
 F E7 Am D 
 Enlighten up, my friends 
 F E7 Am D 
 Enlighten up, my friends 
 F E7 Am D 
 Enlighten up, my friends

C G Am F 
 
 
 [Chorus] 
 C G Am F 
 I thought that I was dreaming when you said you love me 
 C 
 The start of nothing 
 G 
 I had no chance to prepare 
 Am F 
 I couldn't see you coming 
 C 
 The start of nothing, ooh 
 G 
 I could hate you now 
 Am F 
 It's quite alright to hate me now 
 C G 
 When we both know that deep down 
 Am F 
 The feeling still deep down is good 
 
 [Verse 1] 
 C G Am 
 If I could see through walls, I could see you're faking 
 Am F 
 If you could see my thoughts you would see our faces 
 C G Am 
 Safe in my rental like an armored truck back then 
 Am F 
 We didn't give a fuck back then 
 C G 
 I ain't a kid no more 
 G Am F 
 We'll never be those kids again 
 C G Am 
 We drived to Syd's, had the X6 back then 
 F 
 Back then 
 C 
 No matter what I did 
 G 
 My waves wouldn't dip back then 
 Am F 
 Everything sucked back then 
 C 
 We were friends 
 
 [Chorus] 
 C G Am F 
 I thought that I was dreaming when you said you love me 
 C 
 The start of nothing 
 G 
 I had no chance to prepare 
 Am F 
 I couldn't see you coming 
 C 
 The start of nothing, ooh 
 G 
 I could hate you now 
 Am F 
 It's quite alright to hate me now 
 C G 
 When we both know that deep down 
 Am F C 
 The feeling still deep down is good 
 
 [Verse 2] 
 C G Am 
 In the halls of your hotel 
 Am F 
 Arm around my shoulder so I could tell 
 C G Am 
 How much I meant to you, meant it sincere back then 
 F 
 We had time to kill back then 
 C G 
 You ain't a kid no more 
 Am F 
 We'll never be those kids again 
 C G 
 It's not the same, ivory's illegal 
 Am F 
 Don't you remember? 
 C 
 I broke your heart last week 
 G Am 
 You'll probably feel better by the weekend 
 F 
 Still remember, had you going crazy 
 C 
 Screaming my name 
 G Am F 
 The feeling deep down is good 
 
 [Chorus] 
 C G Am F 
 I thought that I was dreaming when you said you love me 
 C 
 The start of nothing 
 G 
 I had no chance to prepare 
 Am F 
 I couldn't see you coming 
 C 
 The start of nothing, ooh 
 G 
 I could hate you now 
 Am F 
 It's quite alright to hate me now 
 C G 
 When we both know that deep down 
 Am F C 
 The feeling still deep down is good 
 
 [Verse 3] 
 C G 
 All the things I didn't mean to say 
 Am F

 C G 
 There were things you didn't need to say 
 Am F

 C 
 I've been dreamin' of you 
 G 
 Dreamin' of you 
 Am 
 I've been dreamin' of you 
 F 
 Dreamin' of you 
 C Am 
 I've been dreaming, dreamin'

[Intro] 
 Dmaj7 Gmaj7 
 
 
 [Verse 1] 
 Dmaj7 Gmaj7 
 Got ashes on my pants, my favourite ones, but I don't care no more 
 Dmaj7 Gmaj7 
 If you're not here with me, my favourite one, I might as well just go 
 Dmaj7 Gmaj7 
 I'll leave it in your room my favourite clothes and you can wear them out, if you want 
 Dmaj7 Gmaj7 
 But just in case you miss the way I smell, it'll just be there 
 
 
 [Chorus] 
 Bm F#m 
 'Cause I can't make you stay if you wanna go 
 Gmaj7 Dmaj7 
 But I will wait for you to say "Come home" 
 Bm F#m 
 Now might not just be the time for us 
 Em Gm 
 But know that what we have will always last, oh 
 
 
 [Interlude] 
 Dmaj7 Gmaj7 
 
 
 [Verse 2] 
 Dmaj7 Gmaj7 
 I fear the day might come that I will see you with another man 
 Dmaj7 Gmaj7 
 As much as it hurts me in the feels, I hope he holds your hand 
 Dmaj7 Gmaj7 
 I pray to God that you live happily, appreciate yourself 
 Dmaj7 Gmaj7 
 Who knows maybe one day we'll be a family 
 
 
 [Chorus] 
 Bm F#m 
 'Cause I can't make you stay if you wanna go 
 Gmaj7 Dmaj7 
 But I will wait for you to say "Come home" 
 Bm F#m 
 Now might not just be the time for us 
 Em Gm 
 But know that what we have will always last 
 
 
 [Bridge] 
 Bm7 F#m7 
 Time is my friend until this life ends 
 Gmaj7 Dm7 
 There's nothing that it cannot mend 
 Bm7 F#m7 Gmaj7 Gm 
 Everyday I wonder if you ever miss my love 
 
 
 [Chorus] 
 Dmaj7 Gmaj7 
 'Cause I can't make you stay if you wanna go 
 Dmaj7 Gmaj7 
 But I will wait for you to say "Come home" 
 Dmaj7 Gmaj7 
 Now might not just be the time for us 
 Dmaj7 Gm 
 But know that what we have will always last 
 
 
 [Chorus] 
 Bm F#m 
 'Cause I can't make you stay if you wanna go (If you wanna go) 
 Gmaj7 Dmaj7 
 But I will wait for you to say "Come home" (Just say it, I'll wait for you) 
 Bm F#m 
 Now might not just be the time for us (The time for us) 
 Em Gm 
 But know that what we have will always last, oh 
 
 
 [Outro] 
 Dmaj7 Gmaj7 x2
